### Load data

### Plot data

```{r,}
plot(population$R1,
     type='b', col='blue',
     xlab='', ylab='Population', xlim=c(1,12), xaxt='n')
axis(1, at=seq(1,12), population$Month, las=2, cex.axis = 0.7)

```
